Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public final class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Controller class manages the execution of an actor space.

    • Field Detail

        public static final Controller CONTROLLER

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the controller.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Asks the executor to stop the execution of the actor space. This task is done by delegating the sending of the request to the service provider. Note that an executor may not be able to manage this request.

      • start

        public void start()
        Asks the executor to start the execution of the actor space after its stop. This task is done by delegating the sending of the request to the service provider. Note that an executor may not be able to manage this request.

      • save

        public boolean save​(java.lang.String i)
        Saves the state of the actor space in a persistent storage when its execution is stopped.
        Parameters:
        i - the actor space persistent storage identifier.
        Returns:
        true for a successful operation.

        public Executor<?> getExecutor()
        Gets the current behavior of the actor executor.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Checks if the runtime is running.
        Returns:
        true if the runtime is running.

      • notifyEmpty

        public void notifyEmpty()
        Notifies that the actor space is empty.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Notifies the arrival of a request to shutdown the actor space.

      • getRequest

        public boolean getRequest()
        Checks if the shutdown of the actor space is under execution.
        Returns:
        true if the shutdown is under execution.
